action.action-desc: Mr. Terry introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 4, United States Code, to authorize members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans to render a military salute during the recitation of the pledge of allegiance.

section.header: Military salute during recitation of pledge of allegiance by members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and by veterans
section.text: Section 4 of title 4, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence: Members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans may render the military salute in the manner provided for persons in uniform..
